home.title: Your Safe Space for Eating Disorder Recovery
home.subtitle: I help individuals who struggle with eating disorders break free from disordered eating behaviors and achieve full recovery ‚Äî reaching mental, physical, and nutritional balance.
home.aboutTitle: Why working with eating disorders recovery coach can transform¬†your¬†life !?
home.aboutText:
Recovery isn‚Äôt just about stopping disordered eating ‚Äî it‚Äôs a journey of rediscovering your true self, and that journey needs a knowledgeable guide who knows the way. That‚Äôs why you should begin this path with me.

As a specialized coach, I will be your ally in this challenge ‚Äî uncovering the roots of your struggles and helping you reconnect with your true voice.

You‚Äôll finally break free from the exhausting cycle of random attempts that have drained your energy.

Here, there‚Äôs no one-size-fits-all formula‚Ä¶ Instead, you‚Äôll receive a personalized plan crafted with awareness and care by a professional.

You‚Äôll learn life-long skills ‚Äî step by step, with me by your side.
Because the moment you decide to seek help... is the moment your victory begins.
home.aboutCoachShort: A certified coach in the treatment and recovery from eating disorders and trauma related to disordered eating. She specializes in helping individuals achieve full recovery. Her approach combines scientific practices with deep personal experience.

about.title: Meet Coach Asmaa
about.bio: Coach Asmaa is a certified specialist in eating disorders and body image with years of experience helping women build a healthier relationship with food and themselves. Her approach is rooted in empathy, evidence-based practices, and deep personal growth.
about.bio2:
I‚Äôm Asmaa Gadelrab, a therapist and coach specializing in eating disorder recovery. My journey into this field began with a deeply personal struggle ‚Äî I battled an eating disorder throughout my teenage years for six long years, marked by mental and nutritional turmoil. I experienced destructive dieting attempts and an obsession with weight loss, which led to disordered eating behaviors.

Through my recovery journey, I discovered how widespread and silent this deadly disorder is. That realization became a turning point in my life ‚Äî I chose to turn my pain into a message of hope and healing for others.
about.bio3:
Founder of the ‚ÄúUndiet Your Mindset‚Äù Program ‚Äî Launched in 2019 as the first program supporting individuals who want to challenge disordered eating thoughts and behaviors.

Creator of the first holistic eating disorder recovery program in the Arab world ‚Äî A comprehensive approach addressing the psychological, social, physical, and nutritional aspects of full recovery.

Helped over 500 individuals globally ‚Äî Guiding them toward complete recovery and food freedom.

questionnaire.title: Eating Habits Questionnaire
questionnaire.intro: Do you struggle with an eating disorder? Take this quick online test to find out if you might need professional advice or treatment.
questionnaire.result_disorder: You may have signs of an eating disorder. We recommend booking a free 1-hour consultation.
questionnaire.result_warning: You may not have an eating disorder, but it‚Äôs important to be mindful of your eating habits.
questionnaire.result_safe: You don‚Äôt appear to have an eating disorder.
questionnaire.q1: I regularly eat even when I am not hungry.
questionnaire.q2: I eat very quickly and am not aware how much I have eaten.
questionnaire.q3: I am very self-conscious about eating in social situations.
questionnaire.q4: I often try new diets and/or exercise plans.
questionnaire.q5: I often feel guilty about eating.
questionnaire.q6: I am very concerned about my weight.
questionnaire.q7: I have used laxatives or diuretics in order to prevent weight gain.
questionnaire.q8: I have induced vomiting to prevent weight gain.
questionnaire.q9: I do not like myself or the way I look.
questionnaire.q10: My weight and appearance constantly preoccupy my thoughts.
questionnaire.free_consultation_form: Apply for a Free Consultation Session
questionnaire.name: Your Full Name
questionnaire.whatsapp_notice: Thank you! If you are eligible, the coach will contact you via WhatsApp within 48 hours.

teen-recovery.title: Teens Eating Disorder Recovery Program
teen-recovery.description:
‚ùì Is your child struggling with food or body image?
The Teens Recovery Program is specially designed to support teenagers on their journey to self-understanding, developing a healthy relationship with their bodies, and breaking the silence and shame often tied to eating disorders.

Whether the struggle is rooted in bullying, peer pressure, childhood trauma, or anxiety about physical changes, this program offers practical and relatable tools that resonate with the teenager‚Äôs world and address their psychological and social needs.
audience: Teens who are struggling with eating disorders, whether visible or hidden.
Teens who feel ashamed to speak about their struggles and often feel isolated or embarrassed.
Teens emotionally impacted by bullying or physical changes.
Teens who need a deeper understanding of their thoughts and emotions about food and body.
Teens who want to break free from comparison and social pressure.
offers: How to distinguish the voice of the disorder from their inner voice of wisdom.
How to handle bullying and harmful comments without emotional collapse.
Mindful eating strategies, even in social settings like school or restaurants.
How to stop the negative self-talk and mirror battles, and replace them with supportive, compassionate language.
How to build a new, healthy relationship with themselves beyond appearance or weight.
results: ‚úÖ Free from the internal battle with food, weight, and body image.
‚úÖ A healthy, guilt-free relationship with food, without fear or calorie obsession.
‚úÖ A shift from body hate to seeing their body as an ally and source of strength.
‚úÖ Mental and physical improvements, including relief from fatigue caused by poor nutrition.
‚úÖ Reconnection with lost social relationships and stepping out of isolation.
teen-recovery.cta: Help Your Teen Start Their Journey
features: üî∏ A Triangular Therapeutic Approach: psychological, nutritional, physical, and social.
üî∏ Mini CBT sessions using games, apps, and interactive tools.
üî∏ A recovery app for teens: meal reminders, exercises, and chat with the coach.
üî∏ Short videos and memes explaining disorders in teen-friendly language.
üî∏ Weekly challenges like ‚ÄúA Day Without Calorie Counting!‚Äù
üî∏ Parent Zoom sessions: learn how to support without pressure.
üî∏ Sensitivity-focused parent guides for body and weight topics.
üî∏ Support for talents like drawing, sports, or writing.
üî∏ Therapeutic photography workshops for body acceptance.
üî∏ Daily voice messages from the coach for emotional support.
üî∏ Crisis support for binge episodes or purging urges.

recovery-journey.title: Recovery Journey from Eating Disorders
recovery-journey.tagline: A holistic healing path toward peace with food and body
recovery-journey.description:
‚ú® Do you feel trapped in a never-ending cycle of eating disorders?
You might sometimes feel like your battle with food never ends...
From episodes of binge eating and forced starvation, to feelings of guilt and shame linked to every meal.
From constant comparisons with others' bodies, to an inner voice that criticizes you relentlessly‚Ä¶
All of this may keep you in a daily struggle, robbing you of peace and distorting your relationship with yourself and your body.

üå± This is where transformation begins‚Ä¶
The "Recovery Journey from Eating Disorders" is not just a temporary plan or a new diet.
It is a comprehensive and deep path that rebuilds your relationship with your body, liberates you from the chains of your past, and equips you with practical, real-world tools to reclaim control over your life.

This program is designed especially for you, if:

- You feel stuck in a daily conflict with food.
- You swing between binge eating and strict restriction.
- You strive for perfection in your appearance and feel unsatisfied no matter what.
- You long to understand your body instead of fighting it.
- You seek freedom from this physical and emotional struggle but don‚Äôt know where to start.
offers: üß† Specialized therapy sessions targeting the emotional and dietary traumas at the root of your eating disorder.
üí™ Practical exercises and body-awareness techniques to reconnect with your body through compassion instead of judgment.
üçΩÔ∏è Structured steps to replace disordered eating behaviors with balanced, healthy coping strategies‚Äîrestoring trust in your food choices.
üìÖ Daily support and consistent guidance to help you overcome triggers and prevent relapses.
üåÄ Reprogramming toxic beliefs about food, body image, and self-worth using advanced psychological tools.
audience: You feel stuck in a daily conflict with food.
You swing between binge eating and strict restriction.
You strive for perfection in your appearance and feel unsatisfied no matter what.
You long to understand your body instead of fighting it.
You seek freedom from this physical and emotional struggle but don‚Äôt know where to start.
results: ‚úÖ Sustainable freedom from binge eating and harmful food behaviors‚Äîresolved at the root.
‚úÖ Emotional calm and mental balance in your relationship with food and social eating situations.
‚úÖ A true shift in how you view your body‚Äîfrom constant criticism to appreciation and acceptance.
‚úÖ Renewed confidence in your body‚Äôs ability to heal and regain control without fear or doubt.
‚úÖ Strong psychological immunity against negative comments, social pressure, and daily stressors.

undiet-mindset.title: Undiet Your Mindset Program
undiet-mindset.tagline: A journey of awareness toward a healthier body and a balanced relationship with food
undiet-mindset.description:
‚ùì Tired of restrictive diets that start with excitement and end in disappointment?
Do you long to break free from scale obsession, emotional eating, and the endless cycle of guilt?

The Undiet Your Mindset program is more than a food plan...
It‚Äôs a transformational shift in how you think about food and your body‚Äîa path where there‚Äôs no restriction, no punishment, and no fake perfection.
audience: Any woman who wants to lose weight without punishing or starving her body.
Those tired of the ‚Äúall-or-nothing‚Äù mindset when it comes to eating.
Anyone who‚Äôs been trapped in a loop of harsh diets and emotional breakdowns.
Women whose relationship with food is filled with emotional tension and contradictions.
Anyone seeking true freedom from food rules, not just a lower number on the scale.
offers: ‚úÖ Daily coaching sessions for two months to build smart and sustainable eating habits.
‚úÖ Deep personal analysis to uncover the connection between your emotions and food.
‚úÖ A flexible, custom-designed nutrition approach tailored to your lifestyle‚Äîno calorie counting or restriction.
‚úÖ Practical tools to help you distinguish between physical hunger and emotional hunger.
‚úÖ Mindful eating strategies and stress-management tools for emotional triggers.
features:
üõë Breaking the Diet Mentality:
- Freeing yourself from toxic beliefs like ‚Äúeating after 8 pm makes you gain weight!‚Äù
- Replacing shame and deprivation with a mindset of awareness and flexibility.

üçΩÔ∏è Redefining Your Relationship with Food:
- Learning how to eat with love and mindfulness, without labeling food as ‚Äúgood‚Äù or ‚Äúbad.‚Äù
- Stopping the use of food as a reward or punishment.

üí¨ Healing the Roots of Emotional Eating:
- Addressing childhood traumas related to food and body image.
- Understanding emotional eating as a coping mechanism and redirecting emotions in healthier ways.
results: ‚öñÔ∏è Natural and sustainable weight loss‚Äîwithout deprivation or mental struggle.
üçΩÔ∏è A positive and balanced relationship with food, free from guilt.
üí™ Genuine confidence in your body and its ability to heal and change.
üéØ A renewed sense of control and peace in your food choices.

deep-health.title: Deep Health Course
deep-health.tagline: A journey of self-discovery beneath food and body
deep-health.description:
‚ùì Have you ever felt that your relationship with food isn‚Äôt just about eating?
Have you wondered why you crave certain foods when you‚Äôre stressed? Or why it‚Äôs hard to stop eating even after you‚Äôre full?

The Deep Health Course isn‚Äôt a diet‚Äîit‚Äôs a deep journey of self-awareness that reveals the hidden dimensions behind your relationship with food and your body.
audience: Any woman who feels that her relationship with food is emotionally and mentally complex.
Those who‚Äôve tried every diet yet never found emotional peace or physical balance.
Anyone who wants to understand ‚ÄúWho am I?‚Äù beyond her weight, appearance, or social roles.
Those seeking true internal healing that touches every aspect of life‚Äînot just meal control.
offers: üîç Decode hunger: Understand the difference between physical, emotional, and soulful hunger.
üß≠ Reset satiety signals: Learn to stop when your body says ‚Äúenough,‚Äù not just when your plate is empty.
‚ùå Break free from toxic diets: Move from deprivation to conscious nutritional flexibility.
üõ°Ô∏è Build mental immunity against societal messages like: ‚ÄúLose weight so you can get married!‚Äù
üé® Art therapy: Reconnect with your body nonverbally‚Äîthrough color, shape, and feeling.
features:
üî¨ Biological Dimension ‚Äì The Intelligent Body:
- How do stress hormones influence your food decisions?
- Why is the gut called the "second brain"? What is its link to mood and immunity?
- How can we balance insulin and female hormones through awareness?

üß† Psychological Dimension ‚Äì The Hidden Mind:
- Exploring emotional and food-related wounds from childhood, like: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt eat or you‚Äôll get fat!‚Äù
- Uncovering automatic thoughts that lead to punishing your body through silence or starvation.

üåç Social Dimension ‚Äì The Toxic Society:
- How comments from family, school, and social media shape your body image.
- Tools to protect against the stigma of thinness or obesity, and reclaim self-respect.

üå∏ Spiritual Dimension ‚Äì The True Self:
- Who are you beyond being the daughter, the student, the overweight, the perfectionist?
- A call to rediscover your authentic inner voice and reconnect with yourself‚Äîaway from comparisons and judgment.
results: ‚úÖ Achieve balance in insulin and female hormones.
‚úÖ Heal your gut and improve digestion, mood, and your sense of physical safety.
‚úÖ Develop deep awareness of your body‚Äôs signals and respond to them with flexibility.
‚úÖ Reconnect with your true self‚Äîbeyond roles and labels.
‚úÖ Gradually recover from societal traumas and reclaim your self-image with clarity and confidence.
